text: @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump When did the @GOP become lovers of govt intervention? They failed to help & left the coronavirus plan to the states and local govts, & watched as thousands died. But when it comes to statues representing oppressive figures in history, let’s protect THOSE dead people. #voteHimOut
